name: Robusta Iced Americano
description: Bold Robusta espresso with chilled water. Perfect kick with notes of dark chocolate and caramel.

reviews.comment: Perfect kick to start my day! Strong and refreshing.
Great Robusta flavor, exactly what I needed.

name: Robusta Iced Latte
description: Smooth Robusta espresso with cold milk. Perfect balance of bold intensity and creamy texture.

reviews.comment: Best iced latte in town! Perfect balance of coffee and milk.
Smooth, creamy, and strong - exactly how I like it!

name: Robusta Hot Latte
description: Rich Robusta espresso with velvety steamed milk. Beautiful crema layer with earthy, bold flavor.

reviews.comment: The foam is perfect! Rich and aromatic every time.
Strong coffee flavor, just the way I prefer my latte.

name: Robusta Mocha
description: Bold Robusta espresso with premium chocolate. Rich, velvety, and intensely satisfying.

reviews.comment: Chocolate heaven with real coffee kick! Absolutely addictive.
Perfect blend of chocolate and coffee. My daily treat!

name: Classic Cold Brew
description: 12+ hour slow-brewed Robusta peaberry. Low acidity with hints of caramel and dark chocolate.

reviews.comment: Smoothest cold brew I've ever had. No bitterness at all!
Worth the wait! Complex flavors and so refreshing.

name: Chocolate Shake
description: Rich chocolate milkshake with premium cocoa. Thick, creamy, and perfectly balanced.

reviews.comment: Pure chocolate indulgence! So thick and creamy.
Great chocolate flavor, not too sweet. Perfect!

name: Fries
description: Crispy golden french fries. Double-fried for extra crunch with perfect seasoning.

reviews.comment: Crispiest fries ever! Perfect with my iced coffee.
Hot and crispy, just the right amount of salt.

name: Nutella Croissant
description: Flaky buttery croissant with generous Nutella. Warm, gooey center in every bite.

reviews.comment: Heaven in every bite! Warm, flaky, and chocolatey.
Best croissant I've had! Nutella filling is perfect.

name: Mocha
description: Perfect blend of coffee and chocolate

reviews.comment: Smoothest cold brew I've ever had. No bitterness at all!
Worth the wait! Complex flavors and so refreshing.

name: Affogato
description: Classic Italian dessert - vanilla ice cream topped with hot espresso shot. Perfect blend of hot and cold.

reviews.comment: Perfect combination of hot espresso and cold ice cream! Classic Italian delight.
Love the contrast of temperatures. Simple but elegant dessert.
